content:
chaoter 17 of original book start from " CHAPTER SEVENTEEN
 Mobility Where It Matters
 From Jeremy
We have talked an awful lot about being “still” and maintaining stability. What about mobility, which is more or less the opposite of stillness? I get asked this a lot. For low back pain sufferers, the place in which you want to promote flexibility and mobility is in the hips and lower extremities. This short chapter teaches you how to increase and maintain " and continue till " Step 4: Bring your arms up over your head. You should feel the stretch in the thigh, groin, and/or inner abdomen. Hold for forty-five to sixty seconds. Then switch sides. " .do you understand chapter 17 of original book ?
